name: Hypno
author: Shigenori Negishi
flavor_text: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

attacks.name: Hand Control
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. You may choose a Supporter card you find there. If you do, your opponent plays that Supporter card. However, you make all decisions for that card. (That Supporter card is discarded.)

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
